name: tm33
effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Ice Punch)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a wall of
light that weakens
physical attacks.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Creates a wall of
light that weakens
physical attacks.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A wall of light
cuts damage from
physical attacks
for five turns.

for five turns.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.
